entry.title: A Trivial Method To Render Material Icons in CAPI
entry.summary: The Lispworks toolset and whole Common Lisp economy is lacking a way to render SVG in a standalone and reliable way, and there's also not a exist binding for libraries such as librsvg. To easily access some useful SVG resources, I once tried to write some codes aiming to translate SVG Paths to Li...

entry.title: Interpreting Hex Colors
entry.summary: I usually have to convert hex code to Lispworks' color-spec. And here's some interesting ways to separate color components from hex code in Lisp. Assuming we have hex string like `"#AABBCCDD"` or `#ABCD`, to collect its `r, g, b, a` and convert them to single-float in range `0-1`: ### Parsing E...

entry.title: TDoV 2024
entry.summary: Happy Transgender Day of Visibility!~ Being a Chinese transgirl for year and half, I'm here, in proud and firm, for all of you. ![Happy TDoV!](/images/tdov.jpg) [Code Here](/trans.pdf)

entry.title: Trivial Spreadsheet for modifying Lispworks Editor
entry.summary: ## Preface The programming interface of Lispworks Editor is not as easily accessible as Emacs, mostly because its exported symbols are too trivial, most of useful functions and facilities are internal and haven't well-documented. In another side, it's source codes are solely in Lisp and have p...

entry.title: Using Non-Focus Interface in CAPI
entry.summary: Lispworks' manual said non-focus window is some kind of window that not taking focus, but in fact any interface can work without focus anyway :)... I just treat it as a way to raise windows without system's decorations like border & action buttons. We will get it done using floating divs in web-b...

entry.title: 药物记录-喹硫平
entry.summary: 12号我们去武精卫看望住院的间月，我们顺便去找医生调了下药——原本在吃劳拉西泮，用来安眠及抗焦虑，但吃了一个多月后已经有耐药性了，睡眠再次变得很差，于是想换一种安眠药。武精卫的医生推荐了曲唑酮、阿戈美拉汀和喹硫平，我们猜测是医生不想给我们开精二类药物，宁可用喹硫平的副作用来安眠。我们最后选择了喹硫平，医生给我们下了100mg/d的医嘱，但给我们开的是200mg无法掰开的缓释片，于是我们干脆擅自加量到200mg了。 吃上喹硫平以后顺便把原先抗精分的齐拉西酮断掉了，现在每天早晨吃文拉法辛，晚上吃喹硫平，吃药的流程简单了很多。 第一天的药效最猛烈，一觉睡了十四个小时，醒来后还是有困困晕晕的...
